# AI Prompt Library for {{COURSE_DOMAIN}}

This library contains tested, effective prompts for common {{COURSE_DOMAIN}} tasks.

---

## How to Use

1. Copy the prompt template
2. Replace `[placeholders]` with your specific values
3. Add any additional context needed
4. Iterate based on results
